metadata.title: CVE-2018-16358 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in inc/core/class.dc.core.php inthe media manager in Dotclear through 2.14.1 allows remote authenticatedusers to upload HTML content containing an XSS payload with the fileextension .ahtml.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
